meanings.definition: A weight division in boxing and other combat sports, typically between lightweight and middleweight.
meanings.sent1: In boxing, a welterweight fighter competes in a specific weight class.
meanings.sent2: The welterweight champion will defend his title next month.
meanings.sent3: The welterweight boxer's gloves were as big as pillows!
meanings.sent4: She moved through the crowd with the welterweight agility of a cat.
meanings.sent5: The welterweight division is known for its fierce competition and skilled fighters.

meanings.sent1: My favorite welterweight always delivers an exciting fight.
meanings.sent2: The welterweight landed a powerful punch on his opponent.
meanings.sent3: The welterweight boxer's nickname is 'The Thunder.'
meanings.sent4: He moved around the ring with the grace of a welterweight dancer.
meanings.sent5: The welterweight boxer's determination is unmatched in the ring.

meanings.definition: To compete in the welterweight division.
meanings.sent1: She trained hard to welterweight in the upcoming tournament.
meanings.sent2: They will welterweight in the championship match next week.
meanings.sent3: He decided to welterweight after seeing the success of his friend.
meanings.sent4: The team will welterweight against their rivals with full force.
meanings.sent5: To welterweight requires discipline, skill, and dedication to the sport.
